Light_Opening.help: A quick swipe with your blades. Does minor lethal damage, but has a quick recharge rate. This attack begins both the Empower and Weaken combination attacks. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

Moderate_Opening.help: You perform a deadly Strike with your blades. This is a basic attack that deals a moderate amount of lethal damage. This power is needed for the Sweep combination attack. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

Moderate_Bridge.help: You Slash at your foe with your blades, dealing a good amount of lethal damage. This attack can reduce a target's Defense, making him easier to hit. This power is needed for the Empower and Weaken combination attacks, and is the beginning of the Attack Vitals combination attack. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Moderate_Bridge.targetHelp: The blades have reduced your Defenses.

AoE_Bridge.help: You spin around in a circle, attacking everyone within melee range with a striking attack. This attack is the finishing move in both the Weaken and Sweep combination attacks. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
AoE_Bridge.targetHelp: Your chance to hit and Defenses have been reduced by the Weaken combo!

Follow_Up.help: You perform a feint attack that deals light damage. After this attack hits, it gives you a large bonus to your chance to hit and damage for a brief time. This power is the finishing move in the Empower combination attack. Damage: Light, Recharge: Slow
Follow_Up.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} attack has increased your attack and damage for a short duration.

Taunt.help: Taunt foes to attack you. Useful to pull enemies off allies and keep them attacking you to raise your Fury. A To Hit check is required to Taunt enemy players, but is not needed against critter targets. Recharge: Fast

messages.attackerHit: You Taunt {PlayerDest} to attack you.
Your {PowerName} hit, and you Taunt {PlayerDest} to attack you.
messages.victimHit: {Playersource} hit you with their {Powername}. You have been Taunted!

messages.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} partially hit! {PlayerDest} is not taunted but their range is reduced!
messages.victimHit: {Playersource} partially hits you with their Taunt! Your range is reduced but the Taunt is not successful!

Special_1.help: Unleashes a series of strong attacks on your foe, dealing high lethal damage and knocking them down. This power is needed for the Attack Vitals combination attack. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
